Uses of Class
org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.JdbcProperties

  • Packages that use JdbcProperties 
    Package Description
    org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc
    Provides a processor that writes audit events to a JDBC database, with the processor managing the connection pool.
    org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.propsbuilder
    Provides classes to build the properties required for the pooled JDBC processor module.

    • Uses of JdbcProperties in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc

      Methods in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc with parameters of type JdbcProperties 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Connection JdbcPoolProcessor.getConnection(JdbcProperties pProperties, ProcessingObjects processingObjects)
      Retrieve a database connection from a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties)
      protected Connection JdbcJndiProcessor.getConnection(JdbcProperties pProperties, ProcessingObjects processingObjects)
      Retrieve a database connection from a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties)
      protected Connection JdbcDsProcessor.getConnection(JdbcProperties pProperties, ProcessingObjects processingObjects)
      Retrieve a database connection from a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties)
      protected abstract Connection AbstractJdbcProcessor.getConnection(JdbcProperties pProperties, ProcessingObjects processingObjects)
      Retrieve a database connection, for instance (and depending on the implementation of this method), from: a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties) a JNDI name (as provided in this class' properties) a data source (as provided in this class' processing objects)
      Constructors in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc with parameters of type JdbcProperties 
      Constructor and Description
      JdbcProperties(JdbcProperties properties)
      Creates a set of JDBC properties from an existing set of JDBC properties, making a defensive copy.

    • Uses of JdbcProperties in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.propsbuilder

      Methods in org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.propsbuilder that return JdbcProperties 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JdbcProperties MapBasedJdbcPropsBuilder.build(Map<String,String> properties)
      Initialize a set of JDBC properties based on key / values in a HashMap.
      static JdbcProperties MapBasedJdbcPropsBuilder.buildDefault()
      Creates a set of JDBC properties that use the defaults as specified in this class.
